kitronik.checkButtonPress: Input block for :GAME ZIP64 standard buttons
kitronik.checkButtonPress|param|button: press to be checked, eg: Up
kitronik.integer_position: Convert integer number to LED Position
kitronik.pixel_position:
Functions to operate the :GAME ZIP64 ZIP LEDs

Convert 8x8 xy Coordinates to LED Position
kitronik.run_motor: Run vibration motor for a particular length of time
kitronik.run_motor|param|run_time: is the length of time the motor will run in ms, eg: 100
kitronik.x_value: Convert integer position number to x coordinate
kitronik.y_value: Convert integer position number to y coordinate
